channel.description: Recent content in Health on Dope| It's Our blog

item.title: Acute stress disease
item.description: Types of ASD Sympathetic (also recognised as ‘combat or flight’ response) Sympathetic Acute Stress Disorder is because of the release of excessive adrenaline and norepinephrine into the worried system.

item.title: Tips for having a healthy heart How to avoid hart attack
item.description: Did you know that those classic risk factors hypertension high cholesterol obesity physical inactivity smoking diabetes and family history - can increase the likelihood of developing cardiovascular disease?

item.title: what is ketogenic diet
item.description: What is a ketogenic diet? Foreword The ketogenic diet is one of the most popular diets in the near future.
